title: Latvian Public Media will likely have to cut costs so coalition can agree on its budget
summary_full: Latvian Public Media (LSM – part of which you are now reading) will likely have to implement austerity measures next year as result of the wrangling between the parties in Latvia's ruling coalition, reports Latvian Radio.
